query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZLET022 AS A USING (
SELECT VALUE(MAX(MANDT),'') AS MANDT , VALUE(MAX(ZKNUM),'') AS ZKNUM , VALUE(MAX(ZKNUM2),'') AS ZKNUM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLET022 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZKNUM = #ZKNUM# AND ZKNUM2 = #ZKNUM2#
) AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.SMDATE1 = HEX(CURRENT DATE) , A.SMTIM1 = HEX(CURRENT TIME) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #ZKNUM# , #ZKNUM2# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , '' , '' )
